task.title: Share todo lists between configured users
task.author: user

steps.summary: Request: update todo-list config and app logic so lists are shared among configured users and show a user indicator to the right of each list item.
Use a share_group field in config to map users into shared access sets, then query stores/items by username IN that group to preserve existing schema while enabling sharing.
Implemented shared access logic in todo-list handlers, including group lookup, access checks, and user indicator rendering on item rows.

Updated config docs and model to include share_group; touched apps/todo-list/config.yaml, apps/todo-list/handlers/{handler.go,items.go,handler_test.go}, shared/models/user.go, apps/todo-list/README.md.

final_summary: Added share_group-based sharing in the todo-list app so users in the same group see and can manage shared lists and items, and render an @username indicator on item rows; updated config schema and docs accordingly.
